Helen Walker

And now she's back from outer space

Jul 27, 2015

I know, I know,  you've missed me!  I wish I had a great excuse, but the truth is, It's way too easy to not write things.  There's lots of reasons why, but before I get to that...  Why not sort it out?

So here's the plan: My smashing, smart friend and I have come up with a scheme to reboot and refocus our blogging...

One year of words: That's 366 (what with next year being a leap year and all) inspiring us to post here and on his website (waynehanley.com) starting today. We've come up with a list of words and we're going to take it in turns.

Either he's going to use the word to inspire a great doodle (because that's one of his super powers) and then I am going to use that doodle to inspire me to write something pithy and wise on a post-it note or I'm going to use the word to inspire me to write something (or quote something) and he is going to use that to inspire his doodle.  Sounds simple?

I hope, so, who knows if we can make it past week one, nevermind up to 366 posts. But there's fun to be had. And that sounds like a grand scheme.

As well as on our websites you can find our posts on Twitter and Instagram (We're using #PositivePostIts)

Feel free to join the fun! This week our words are:

  • Monday: Alarm
  • Tuesday: Happy
  • Wednesday: Strength
  • Thursday: Virtue
  • Friday: Team
  • Saturday: First
  • Sunday: Logical

And here is the song my post might have you humming.

https://youtu.be/ZBR2G-iI3-I?t=23s
